website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for larger groups wanting to stay in contact during a ride.
pros: Mounts on full and half helmets
Capable of connecting up to 8 riders on its intercom system, and clear to 500 meters of separation
Pairs with other Fodsports models and some generic headsets
cons: Connecting more than 2 users can be complicated

customer_reviews.title: Tech support was very prompt (didn't have an issue just had questions)
customer_reviews.text: Photo 01:set charging Photo 02:mount on helmet Photo 03:mounted ear piece (can disconnect one side if law requires) Photo 04:noise canceling microphone (lost my foam cover but still works) Device works great, one helmet had existing mount points for the speakers other didn't but was able to successfully complete the installation on both. Tech support very responsive great customer service Audio quality was great sometimes had a small echo but nothing disturbing
customer_reviews.author: Jason B. Hart

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend. The unit started falling apart after 5 uses. The unit was never dropped or involved in an accident. The volume up button just came off one day. I put on my helmet and the unit was fine I got home and the volume up button was missing. I took out the bike again the next day and the dust cover for the AUX and the charging port did the same thing (there when I started the ride gone when I got where I was going). Build quality on this product is not the best. May have just gotten a defective unit but I am not satisfied with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Not as good with 4 riders
customer_reviews.text: We bought 4 units with the intention of syncing them on a road trip around Ireland. From the beginning we had issues and with 4 units. We always lost one person and without any pattern or logic. One day it was the last person paired and another day the second and so on. I would say we had good quality 4 way comms about 30% of the time. The rest it was hit and miss. The times we did have the most success was when we were close together and riding slowly. Overall I would give them a 2 to 2.5 star rating and would not recommend them for anyone with more than 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: MOC

customer_reviews.title: NOTHING TO DISLIKE ABOUT M1 S PRO.
customer_reviews.text: i really love this communicator. Audio is very clear , loud enough and noise reduction circuit works extremely well. my wife was not to ENTHUSED about getting one, years ago they were very noisy, Lots of static. NOT SO WITH THIS UNIT. No problem pairing two units together. I was even able to talk with another bike with a different brand communicator. Buttons are large and easy to find. This unit WORKS.
customer_reviews.author: walter lurz

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly written instructions
customer_reviews.text: Product "might" be oK but installation and operating instructions leaves a lot to be desired. It could be much easier if you didn't have to figure out every step on your own. The instructions and video seem to be written by developers for each other, for people who are accustomed to using this product. I don't have a lot of confidence in this product because of the poor customer service. When I asked a question they refered me to a video which was worse than the instruction manual! Their blanket statement "we make everything right" is a joke...they don't seem to do anything except give you the asian 2 step. I have regrets about buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buttons fell off but works well & microphone doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: EDIT CHANGED TO ONE STAR NOW now microphone doesn't work on other device cannot hear only low muffled Giving three stars because buttons on one device fell off randomly no rough use and will not stay on other than that very good product
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Fodsport MS-1
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Light weight with long battery life. Easy to connect. Love that when you connect it's just like an open mic with your buddy. I thought you had to push the button to talk but you do not have to push anything. Only thing I wish was better, was the volume. It does not go very loud. Music is fine but hard to hear chat while ridding. So yeah, not loud enough. Other than that these are very cool and work well. Speakers are flat and fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Sgt Rock162

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend 👌
customer_reviews.text: For the price... These are pretty damn awesome. They install pretty easily just require a little patience to make it seemless. I had to adjust the ear speakers a couple times to get them placed right over my ears for optimal sound. They connect to my phone for music and another unit for coms. While listening to music just hit the intercom and it pauses the music and starts a communication link with the other device(s).
customer_reviews.author: Brett M.

customer_reviews.title: Junk- line of sight only for 200 yards
customer_reviews.text: Hoped to have an even better experience as our 1st set (different, cheaper brand) worked great until they were run over. This set was easier to pair then our old set, but NEVER clear even 20 ft away from each other. Tried all the fixes and suggestions, just pure junk. I would tape my kids walkie talkie to my helmet before ever buying this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Connects well with the (big name) units. Sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of buying this unit at first, but when I got it, I was extremely happy with it. It sounds good, stays paired, the battery lasts forever it seems like. the comms mode works great to talk to your friends. I've paired it with a SENA no problem...after a bit of googling. Basically just hold down the pair button on the SENA for like 12 seconds and it goes into a 3rd party pairing mode. Routing the speakers was a breeze. I installed the mic right in the front of my helmet and people can't even tell I'm on my bike when on a phone call....unless I send it... :) I'd recommend this unit for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Snider

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them, there amazing on all fronts(using for riding dirt bikes)
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these to ride dirt bikes with my family. I was concerned about the background noise of the bikes, there awesome you hear nothing but the folks your talking with, crystal clear. The distance is also a plus, its insane on how far they work away from one another. Working the wiring into the helmets is a bit of project but once complete its a thing of beauty. For the record one of the units did not entirely work correctly, I contacted the company and they sent me a new one right away, what a pleasure working with this seller. As stated in the subject, you wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ladela

customer_reviews.title: Works great!  Blown away by quality!
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely pleased with this purchase. For half the price of the on-brand ones, I get a great product! I've had multiple people on the other end of my phone conversations while I'm driving that they couldn't even tell I was riding my motorcycle. I have loud pipes, no windshield, and my helmet is a half helmet. The microphone goes right up to my mouth and it cancels all of that unnecessary sound out. I honestly don't know how they do it, but they do. So amazing. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money! Does everything right for me.
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy the FODSPORTS M1S Pro when my current "look alike" headsets continued to fail. Basically the Fodsports Motorcycle Bluetooth M1S Pro works like the BT-03 models used to work until J&M did a new model release (BT-04) and had a major fail. The Fodsports Motorcycle Bluetooth M1S Pros plugged right into my helmet hook and worked flawlessly. Fast connection between units is back! Fast music track switching is back! And no more turning off randomly! Love these. Nice work Fodsports. Can't beat the price for TWO complete units!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Although it started out working great and thought I had a good deal, it started to break up and lose connections withthe second unit that was on my wife's helmet on MY bike. It was want a distance issue. It would disconnect and break up of and on as if it could not clearly connect or interference. I tried to make contact with the seller company but no contact data was available in the packaging or even in their instruction manuals. I tried to find them online but could not find any contact info for help. So I returned the product for a refund and purchased another product. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Simons

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this mainly for listening to music but I got to use the intercom with my wife recently and it was perfect. no wind sound at all and voice was clear. With gloves on the controls are a littler hard to feel but with time you figure it out. Even with earplugs in the sound was acceptable. Are the speakers Bose quality, no but for the money these are great. Instructions were easy to understand and it includes boom and internal mic as well as a couple of different mounting systems. Compared to the cost of the other big name brands these are worth looking into.
customer_reviews.author: cliff

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: They echo bad in the helmet . I moved the speaker and the mic and no fix found , I contacted seller and go no response .
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: I can't hear you
customer_reviews.text: They come packaged really nice and my wife and I were excited to get them and try them out. But it rained everyday for a week after we got them. And while they work great in the house as we tested them, they leave a great deal to be desired in real world usage. Once we got on the road, we couldn't hear each other. Once we stopped at a light again the sound was clear. At any speeds higher than 35 mph conversations are almost nonexistent.
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine A. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Way better option than buying from the Harley Dealer
customer_reviews.text: Sleek design, Waterproof, great battery life. Excellent range. I've only used with one other rider, but I've got another friend with the same unit and we should all be chatting together on the next ride. Pairing with my other friend was easy. Lots of support videos from OEM and users on YouTube. Install was fairly easy, but no instructions on which microphone to use for different h lmet types. In fact no instructions illustrating the low profile microphone. Still optimizing mic location for best sounds quality, but it's worked well so far. I would by again.
customer_reviews.author: CycleDad8277

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I installed this intercom somewhat following the various youtube videos. Mostly common sense if you know how to take your helmet apart. Once installed, the intercom seems to stay in place perfectly fine. Pairing the two units was a snap. I've taken it riding with my friend and we had normal clear conversations while riding in the city. We were sometimes separated by about 100 yards with no loss of comms. The only possible issue is I don't think I can use the helmet to helmet comms while connected to googlemaps or waze. I will test it out this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the headache!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and I so we could talk while on rides together. These were great the first day we installed them and then coms wouldn’t work, music wouldn’t play and my headset only played out of one side. I checked the connection on the cables and everything was fine. We had to pair the devices for coms every time we rode together and I would go to use it and it wouldn’t work and it would keep his music from playing for the rest of the ride. These have been returned after only having them three days.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work
customer_reviews.text: These headsets do not work will unpair within 20 mins of starting a ride then we have no communication with the other riders in our group very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic connections
customer_reviews.text: My biggest complaint about this device is how cheap the plastic appears to be made. The mounting bracket plastic broke on not only the main unit but also on the mounting brackets that connect to your helmet. Little perplexing not trying to be too judge mental but if you can’t keep the unit attached then What’s the point?
customer_reviews.author: rod copeland

customer_reviews.title: Great product, super seller.
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome for all kinds of helmet based activities! I got a pair for myself and my young son for skiing after many frustrating experiences caused by not being able to communicate. These made it so easy to talk back and forth, worked perfectly and easy set up. Also, the seller is awesome. I needed more of the microphones and speakers for my biking helmets (again, with youngsters being able to clearly communicate on dangerous terrain and streets is invaluable). I accidentally bought the wrong ones and the seller gave me the right ones no problem or hassle. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Theov

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good so far. We set them up in 2 different makes of helmets. One was quick and easy and the other was a bit more difficult because the pads didn’t come out. I’d say if you buy I would look at your helmet to make sure all pads are removable. As for the distance, I’d say the 500 meters advertised is a stretch. Having said that, we did get about 200 meters out of them. We were in semi-wooded area so maybe there was some interference versus being on highway. Overall I’d say price and ease of use make them worth trying.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping for better sound quality, but it's not.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using fodsports previous generation comm device for a couple of years, which was good at the time but very difficult to use for multiple riders with its tiny buttons. This new version is designed well, but I was disappointed by the sound quality. It's just not loud enough for motorcycle communication. It works well at lower/quieter speeds, but you can't hear much at higher/louder speeds. Noise cancellation kind of depends on the helmet too, and I do have a couple of good helmets.
customer_reviews.author: MN

customer_reviews.title: Way too quiet
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, but they are so quiet. When listening to music while going highway speed you only hear the high frequencies mixed with wind and when you wear earplugs you can actually hear the music, but they wont go high enough in volume to actually enjoy it. The intercom with pillion is the same. It's ok until you get up to 40 mph then it's not usable. Also when putting on earplugs it's better because at least earplugs kill the wind noise, but still too quiet to enjoy the conversation. I got it based on reviews and everyone praising them, but I wish they would have made them to be able to get much much louder.
customer_reviews.author: sergio spolitak

customer_reviews.title: Crisp sound, decent install despite not ideal English instructions
customer_reviews.text: Alright just got these in the mail and hooked a helmet up after charging. They are amazing. WAY impressed with the music sound quality. I haven't ridden the snowmobile with them yet but I think they're going to work great! Chinese instructions slightly unclear but I seemed to muddle through well enough. Big test will come when I try to hook a 3rd one up to the 2. We shall see when that time comes. Overall super pleased with the out of box and initial hook up.
customer_reviews.author: Mike V

customer_reviews.title: Lasts all day!
customer_reviews.text: Went out with three other riders. We bought these specifically for this ride. The units were turned on at 10 am and they lasted until 7:30 pm. Very happy with how long the battery lasted. Pairing 4 units with the instructions and the YouTube videos was impossible. Ended up doing my own thing that worked. My helmet had a lot of wind noise which made hearing difficult over 60mph and impossible at 70mph. the other riders were fine with their helmets at those speeds. I wear the Icon Airflight helmet .
customer_reviews.author: Alexandro Berrios

customer_reviews.title: Great tech, TERRIBLE connection to helmut
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality noise and microphone. Unfortunately, on Day 1 of use, 3 of the units fell off because the 3M sticky pad is so poor. And one of the units was lost in the process... If you buy, make certain that you find a better quality sticky pad to attach to helmet.
customer_reviews.author: TGH

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We received these a couple of weeks ago. It took me about an hour to get them properly installed in our helmets. They were pretty easy to install. It took us a couple of times of reading the instructions for us to remember the main function features. We used them for the first time a couple of days ago and they were amazing! Great sound and easy to use. I connect mine with the SiriusXM app and absolutely love it. Great product! The only downside I’ve found at this point is that they are very hard to put into the helmet clip.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Martens

customer_reviews.title: Wow.  Excellent product, no complaints after 1 year of solid use.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My son and I have used these, first, on an enduro trip to AZ, then nearly 50 times since. No issues at all. Easy to use, link up without hassle, and super clear. I’ve used alone to Bluetooth music and gps and works great. I’ve never had the big named and expensive units to compare, but I’m very pleased with these. I’m actually buying another pair for my other son who now rides. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: J. Whisenant

customer_reviews.title: Battery is great speakers suck
customer_reviews.text: I puchased this set a few months ago. They have a fabulous battery life!! I think i have charged it 2 times since i have had it and i use it often. Only bad is the speakers i got in the kit constantly crackle like the speaker is blown. Does the same with both sets of headphones. For the price i expected better quality. I just live with it cause i refuse to pay the 60 bucks to replace them. I just live with it crackle and popping
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes riding with others more enjoyable when you can communicate
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical of this at first. I was worried about the Bluetooth dropping out, the sound quality, volume controls and connectivity distances. After using this for two months all of those skepticism have been erased. This is a very good set of coms. The connectivity distance is really amazing if there are only two riders connected. I bought additional units and now have 6. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: john morris

customer_reviews.title: Great communication system
customer_reviews.text: We got these for both the quads and our motorcycles. We have used them on our full helmets for the quads so far. Just wished we would have done it a lot sooner. They connect via blue tooth easily to the phone but they connect to each other even easier. Batter life after 2 days of quadding 40 miles in an ORV park was still above 90 percent (on constant for approximately 4 hours). Voices were crystal clear, no back ground noise. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: M. Murray

customer_reviews.title: i’d buy again, great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this unit. did a lot of research of both more expensive and cheaper models and rolled the dice on this one. i was most suprised at how i can make calls with little motorcycle noise. It also made it great to talk to my passenger (not at the same time). One thing though is that the speakers only project sound in one “straight” direction like a laser. at first i had the speakers slightly tilted and thought this sound volume stinks, then i straightened the speakers and had to turn down the volume a lot lol.
customer_reviews.author: Nasketcase

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: A little tricky to mount on helmet we had to shorten the clamp by cutting a quarter of inch off prior to mounting on our helmets. Once we did the Bluetooth connections to each other unit and our cell phones we had fun testing them out and they seem to work great, my husband walked several yards away and we still had good communication with each other clearly. We haven't used these on an actual ride due to the winter weather.
customer_reviews.author: BelindaDavid

customer_reviews.title: worked good
customer_reviews.text: The cons that I came across is 1. Requires special sized (long or with angled plastic) micro usb connector that came with the device. Plastic gets in the way because the device has "border" sticking out around the charging port. 2.installation takes trial and error. Tough to know where to put the velcro tape so it doesnt rub my face or head.
customer_reviews.author: ivan

customer_reviews.title: Overall great buy!
customer_reviews.text: For 2 riders the distance with no obstacles is about1- 1 1/2 football fields. Ass you add riders it increases because they bounce signal. Other option is using your phone and distance is unlimited based on cell signal for 2 riders or a group call. I dont like that you have to have a special charge wire because normal ones dont fit. So dont lose your wire. Battery is good. Music plays a t okay volume but sounds like alot of reverb. No real base in these. Maybe if you got them closer they would sound better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was good until it would not hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: After five months use one of my headsets will no longer hold a charge. I left it to charge overnight. I get it powered on the next morning and five minutes later it powers off. Very disappointed. I have contacted the seller and the company. I will update after I find out how well getting a replacement goes. UPDATE: I did receive the new communications device. I did not get it before the trip. I have used it since then and still would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Easy to connect, great battery life
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with connectivity and battery life. Connects easily to my phone, as well as the 2nd communicator. ***UPDATE 5/30/2020 After I put my helmets in storage for several months, one of the communicators would no longer start up or charge at all. I contacted customer service and they were extremely helpful! They sent me a new communicator right away at no extra cost to me. I was able to charge this one up and sync it right up to my other communicator. Very happy with this product and the customer service I received!!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: They work well but I've only had them 1 riding season. Update: one of the units stopped charging, mind you I now have 3 units. The sellers actually sent me a brand new unit without giving me any headache over when I purchased the original unit. If you're in the market for a headset for your helmet and you don't want to spend $300.00+ this is a great buy and it pairs easily on group rides.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.S

customer_reviews.title: Can't hear anything over 30/35 mph.
customer_reviews.text: I really wish I would have hooked it up and tryed it out before I installed, just got back home and you can't hear anything over 30/35 mph, I got the two pack and was hoping that maybe it was defective but tryed the other one and it was about the same at high volume but the secound one only one of the speakers were working. Don't waste your time if your on anything other then a moped that tops out at 30mph this is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine H.

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: The speakers went into my helmet very easy and was easy to tuck the wires in to hide them. The sound quality is good for these even at 70 mph I can still hear it but it's a little difficult to hear the music at that speed. 55 mph or less the loudest volume is perfect. The only thing I didn't like about this is the hard mic velcros on the side of my helment cause I have a half helmet. The velcro would not hold the mic in place it keeps coming loose and falling down. There needs to be some sort of clip like the one used to hold the main receiver of the unit to the helment.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for in helmet communication and a lot more expensive ones at that. I came across this one and decided to try it. Could not be happier with it. Works great for us in the side x side. We use to have to stop every time we wanted to talk, not anymore! I was worried that this wouldn’t work well with flip up helmets but not a problem. The sound quality is good but could be better for when listening to music. Definitely worth the price and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Matt P.

customer_reviews.title: Need stronger mounts and better ear pieces
customer_reviews.text: These work but they need more refining to be of use for ATVs. The mounts break easily.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: Not to shabby for a set of bt devices at a fraction of big names
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I've only been on one ride with this system installed but it seems to work great. I was even able to connect to my previous bt on a secondary helmet. Now the whole fam can talk without replacing all the coms. Speakers are pretty loud even with plugs in.
customer_reviews.author: Jaz S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My dad can hear me perfectly even over my loud V&H pipes. We tested the range and it’s even further than it said they can reach. I went so far I was out of sight and he could steal hear me.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Bell Bullitt helmet
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my girlfriends Icon Alliance Primary GT helmet and worked great but the speakers are not really low profile like they say and crush my ears with my Bell Bullitt helmet. I’m thinking of cutting some of the foam on my helmet, I’m assuming it will probably void my warranty, oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Gretle20

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this double Bluetooth headset so I can listen to my music, my husband can listen to his music, and we can talk to each other while on the motorcycle. It is very easy to install an we can move it to new helmets if needed. We think the sound quality is very good. The charge time seems to be good as well. We are both very pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lilyray

customer_reviews.title: I wish It is would have fit our helmets I didnt Know it was for a closed helmet
customer_reviews.text: I couldnt get it took connect and work, also it doesn’t fit our helmets returning it to purchase a different kind. I didnt Connect it and use it so I am Not sure about the sound quality! I just Noticed right away that it was not going to be good for our helmets! I will be ordering another one that will fit an open helmet! If u have one let me know! I will be returning tomorrow
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Great set of mics
customer_reviews.text: Bought four of these for my family to ride our dirt bikes together. Started training our daughter and son on riding needing something to be able to speak to them while riding. These have been great. Grandparents are going to buy another set to join the Bluetooth hook up.
customer_reviews.author: Shawnie

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Works great with 2 people. Found with 3 people the 3rd person has to hit there com button to join the conversation but no big deal. Had to use the sticky mount for my snowmobile helmet and the mount hasn't budged being used in the cold. Battery lasts all day. Mic gets wet due to breathing on it in the cold and hasn't quit yet.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Works well but slight learning curve
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to intercoms for motorcycles. It works, but the learning curve was a little high for me to figure out. Once you do figure it out, it works well. Make sure you put the line to the mic on the right side, one of mine was stretched a bit and kept coming out until I moved the line to the other side, now it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Saturnino

customer_reviews.title: Fastest  shipping delivery overseas
customer_reviews.text: Thankful FUAOTESI، easy to fixed inside & outside helmets About 5 to 10 min approximately , have convenient kit for all helmets, catalogs 3 languages, easy Guide instruction, easy pairing with mobile and others intercom brand, is easy mobility to charge without helmet, 3M two face stickers “ hard stick”, clearly sounds by mobile calls & music, other devices also received clearly voice from my microphone. Thankful for FUAOTESI😍👍😍
customer_reviews.author: wanasa6969

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! What a GREAT buy! Save alot of money and still get a quality product. This set works awesome with both hard and soft mics. I highly recommend this product. Works great, clear sound, installs easily. Love this product and saved massively
customer_reviews.author: sandra j. bates

customer_reviews.title: Really bad sound quality
customer_reviews.text: If you're going over 50mph good luck deciphering what the other person is saying. It also has a somewhat limited range, not good enough for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget Headset for Riding to Tunes
customer_reviews.text: Love using this headset as it is much more comfortable than using ear headphones while riding. The install required some modification to the helmet, however, it was a very easy job. The sound quality is very good, however, if you approach higher speeds (70-100mph), the quality degrades, but is still audible. In addition to the sound, the battery life is really good, lasting multiple rides before charging. I would recommend these headphones to other riders who want to listen to music during their morning commute.
customer_reviews.author: cyndi reimer

customer_reviews.title: One happy motorcycle granddad!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set to try and so far my grandson and I have enjoyed being able to ride and talk at the same time. He is just learning to ride so having the ability to talk to him while teaching him the dangers of the road is an asset. I have enjoyed listening to music and having the ability to make or answer a phone call. The sound and audio is very good and the units are easy to install. I just bought another set for my other grandson and my son-in-law so when we ride we can communicate.
customer_reviews.author: Sgt Rock

customer_reviews.title: Great budget friendly unit & excellent customer support.
customer_reviews.text: As a new motorcyclist I was looking for an affordable Bluetooth headset to communicate with my buddies when riding. After one of my friends pick up one of these I figured I’d give it a shot as well. One of the units clips broke and the seller was extremely quick to resolve the issue and get it replaced. I ended up using the other unit which was intended for my fiancé until the replacement comes in. For the money the sound and build quality is very good and i would recommended this product to anyone looking for a budget friendly setup.
customer_reviews.author: Kamber

customer_reviews.title: Good looking n easy pairing n re-pairing..
customer_reviews.text: After 2 weeks from full charge, battery still remain above 90%.. within 2 weeks, my hours of riding approx 3 hrs.. easy installation on my scorpion helmet.. Sound good (half volume) even at speed 120kmh... For the price, I’m happy with the performance & built quality..
customer_reviews.author: MuddStyLo

customer_reviews.title: I bought 1 for me and loved it.
customer_reviews.text: I have mine mounted to my motorcycle helmet and it works great. Always connects to my phone. I liked so well that I purchased two more for my Daughter and her husband as Christmas gifts. I look forward to have a group ride so we can connect them together and communicate while we ride.
customer_reviews.author: ibpoor

customer_reviews.title: Not all there
customer_reviews.text: I like the radios, but when I received my box of two, one helmet bracket was missing and a speaker mic set. I emailed the company fodsports and got no response. I was hoping they would help me out with this issue, but as of today no word.
customer_reviews.author: ShellyB

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Long battery life, good sound quality, great quality for the price We figured out a way to use Bluetooth to speak to each other while at the same time hard-wiring into our phones to listen to music. It's really nice for long trips. One of the microphones stopped working a few months after purchase, I reached out to the seller, and they were responsive and eager to resolve the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great to Deal with!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome we ride with 8 people and it works great ! Dealer experience was Five Star!! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Philip Portzen

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound, cut out
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Fodsports M1S Pro 2000m to replace a Sena 5 in my old helmets, poor sound, cuts out, drops words in our conversation. drops calls from phone, I would not buy again. wasted my money. They did send me another one free, it is no better. Bad purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Update: Fodsport M1 S pro motorcycle communication headsets
customer_reviews.text: Update: These headsets work great with two riders. We purchased two more headsets for friends after riding with ours. The fourth rider connected wasn't loud enough to be heard, then disconnected abruptly. After stopping for lunch, the fourth rider reconnected. At speeds over about 20 mph nobody could understand anybody else. When we stopped at stop signs everyone could be heard and understood. My husband swears somebody was abducted by aliens according to the noises he heard in his headset. Going back to the Sena's for now, until we can find other headsets easier to connect.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Love these headsets!
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, save some money for the ride! These are as good, if not better, than much more expensive headsets that I have used. Item is exactly as described, and the customer service was so responsive to a query that I bought 1 more. You can’t go wrong with this headset, it’s easy to use and is a heck of a lot of fun...Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: B. T. B.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I use these as we cycle around town. They have great sound, even with a 25 mph breeze. Distance is less than what was advertised - good up to 150 yards, and when not obscured by intervening houses.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Mills

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised. No support.
customer_reviews.text: Don't trust the positive reviews. Sound quality between their devices starts to degrade at about 75 feet and completely gone at 300 feet. The December 2019 update fails to connect using Windows 7 and the virus detector on Windows 10 flags it as a virus. Two attempts for assistance from Fodsports support was completely useless. First response was quote: "plug the USB cable in correctly". Second was a link to a YouTube video.
customer_reviews.author: 2WheelsRule

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These have been amazing! Got one for me and my girlfriend and we can talk and hear eachother just fine going down the highway. A little hard to hear when the wind is blowing against us really hard, but thats to be expected. The sound quality is great and sounds like I am wearing earbuds. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Tonja Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend these units. We have three couples that ride some stones four (8 people total). We sync all of them up and they work great. Sometimes it takes a minute to get all of them together but they work great. I don’t know why you would spend more on another.
customer_reviews.author: Jared K.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service.
customer_reviews.text: These Bluetooth communication devices work really well. The sound quality is great. It’s as clean as if you were talking on the phone. They were easy to install on our helmets. We have now bought 4 of them because of how well they worked. The seller contacted me and offered to send me free accessories for purchasing more of these Bluetooth devices. I love when companies offer to do this and make you feel valued. I would definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Great units for the price..
customer_reviews.text: We've been using these been using these on our rides for several months now, they have good range, clarity, and when they say they're waterproof, they mean it! Have use these in several torrential downpours with no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: NOT really sure
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a trip, but just using after set up the speakers are weak and updating the unit is very complicated. Fact: I haven't been able to download the update on several computers. I think I wish I spent more money on better stuff
customer_reviews.author: Rob Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I love my Fodsports Bluetooth headsets. My wife and I use them any place we go on our motorbike, even short trips! I can easily toggle between the intercom channel with her and my phone's navigation! Exactly what we were looking for and great value to boot! We did have a minor complication with the battery. However, I reached out to customer service and I am super impressed with how professionally and diligently they resolved the issue for us. Back on two wheels with FodSports! Great product and great company!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wise

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!
customer_reviews.text: For the amount of money that was spent on this product, and even comparable to top rated brands, this is loud it has a lot of different functions. I drive a Yamaha R6 with an aftermarket exhaust and I have no problem hearing my music or directions. I can activate Siri from my Bluetooth it’s a really great deal for the money. I can’t justify spending $400 on a set of Bluetooth on $150 does the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Olive Oyl

customer_reviews.title: Good for 1st time intercom
customer_reviews.text: This is my first intercom system, so I don’t have anything to compare. Easy to install and figure out. Had to turn it almost all the way up to hear it while I was riding and getting Siri to work is still an issue. Haven’t used the intercom system yet. Will update as I use it more.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Price

customer_reviews.title: Battery life good in cold. Good sound on the snowmobile
customer_reviews.text: Used a pair of these for a snowmobile trip to the U.P. Long weekend with warm (34 degree F) to cold single digits and they performed as I had hoped. Battery life did not let us down on 6 hour trips. Signal strength was good albeit got disconnected in the twisty trails in the woods and hills being front and rear of a four person group with no communicators in between. Overall happy with the purchase and my group will be purchasing more to include more in the conversation as well as bridging the distances between us.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing volume.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this speaker system. When riding, and the volume is as high as it goes, I can’t hear anything coming out of the speakers. My sena system was much better with the volume.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: They’re ok, that it
customer_reviews.text: The intercom works, however i’m disappointed in the range. the speakers are bit thick and it took me a while to get them positioned so they didn’t hurt me ears. The speaks have very little to no bass.
customer_reviews.author: Jason and Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Great value, easy to use, waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Works very well and has easy to use controls. We rode 11 hours and only had one hour where it wasn’t raining. The units worked perfectly all day. I have had these for me and my wife for a couple weeks now. We love them. Battery life is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Cheap for a reason.
customer_reviews.text: They did pretty good when riding about 30 mph, but once we got on the highway going about 60mph, my wife, who was riding on her own bike, and my daughter, riding with me on my bike, could not make out what each other were saying.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: You could not find another headset to fit this item
customer_reviews.text: I hate that I purchased this item it does not have a aftermarket headphone set you can only use The One came with it because they have a mini USB c adapter I will advise all my motorcycle club members not to purchase this item
customer_reviews.author: Garfield Seymour

customer_reviews.title: WORK AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for snowmobiling. tried last weekend and they work great! easy to install, battery lasts for a long time (used for 8 hrs with no issue). Pairing is easy. used the boom mic and had a hard time hearing the other rider when going over 60mph due to the snowmobile engine noise at that speed. Going to try the other smaller mic this weekend and see if the noise cancellation is better. Overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked awesome
customer_reviews.text: Works great in my atv helmet. Used it in mine and childs helmets. Saved my voice. Nice and loud. Battery last long time. I haven’t tested but believe the distance is about a block apart.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio R.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 sets of these for our family. Wow! Exceeded our expectations in quality. Easy to set up on each helmet. Sound was amazing on each performance option. Clear and cuts the wind on our closed helmets with visor open. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Angela DoBell

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality on the headset is very poor quality. Unless you’re listening to music, it’s pretty much a waste of money. The volume of the voice when talking to people on the phone and people over the intercom is horrible. That’s with the volume turned all the way up.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Remember, you’re on a motorcycle
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was better than expected, even when riding different motorcycles with different noise levels. I rode with this unit in a touring bike and also on a Dyna and the wind and exhaust noise made no difference in the sound quality in the speakers and sound filtering in the mic. For the price, it’s abilities to link to other devices, and what you get for having comms on a motorcycle, it’s a good unit that I’m pleased for purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Shipwreck

customer_reviews.title: boom mic
customer_reviews.text: i like the product. works well. i wear a full face helmet and find the boom mic to work better as i can adjust it to fit closer to my mouth which in turn makes communication better.
customer_reviews.author: Kozmo

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: They work as described. I haven't used them for a group just between me and my rider and they work great. Plenty loud. I had a bit of a problem with one of the speakers being weak. The seller responded quickly and sent me two new earphone sets. I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Equipman

customer_reviews.title: Options on headphones
customer_reviews.text: It is awkward to put this units on a half helmet. The do work, but it would be nice to be able to use a nice set of earbuds in lieu of the speakers provided. There is no way to use standard earbuds with this device.
customer_reviews.author: VMI 1982

customer_reviews.title: Great as intercom
customer_reviews.text: Gave a 3 across board. Not what I was looking for. Worked as inter com, Couldn’t share music with passenger was my issue. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend for more than 2 riders
customer_reviews.text: They claim up to 8 riders can connect, but that's a false claim if you got more than 3 ppl connecting it glitches out and constantly drops people, we spend a good 2 hours trying to figure it out and finally gave up. However when there is only two of us hooked up it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Muki ibrahim

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money! Easy to set up and easy to connect to the phone and other riders. Buttons are simple and large and easy to press with gloves on. Simple and effective headset
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: So far these have been great! All of the features are available between four buttons, and we can hear each other very clearly!
customer_reviews.author: KVCaughey

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and price
customer_reviews.text: Got these so that I could communicate with my daughter when taking her to school. They work really well. I got a call while going 75 mph on the freeway, and the caller didn't even know. Music sounds good (I listen through earplugs). The intercom works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Good while it works
customer_reviews.text: Although the intercom worked very well for a while, pretty soon the microphone stopped working on one of the devices. Also, the rubber cover on the buttons is flimsy and can tear very easily, which soon happened on the other device. The seller was difficult to track down at first, but once I contacted him he was extremely helpful and courteous, and provided a refund right away. So two stars for the intercom, five stars for the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Garcia Campuzano

customer_reviews.title: Don’t want to ride without these again.
customer_reviews.text: Once you get them all linked they work fine. If one losses connection, you have to pair them all together again. This can be a big delay for our snowmobiling group, got to stop and reconnect all of them. The sound quality is really good! The signal is not strong during bad weather, snow storms cut the signal range considerably.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These work as ad says.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these for use with 4 other friends snowmobiling. We have found them to be useful. Range is limited as the ad says. We are now adding other devices including Bluetooth walker talkies to increase range. I did have a problem with one unit and the service/support was great!
customer_reviews.author: Paul N.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! We use them for when we are out riding together for Communication to each other. It’s crystal clear when you are chatting to each other. It’s small and compact which is what we love about it. The battery lasts for a long time which is awesome for long rides. Customer service is also amazing! We ordered the two pack and didn’t really look into it when we first got it. But one of the sticky hooks were missing and we could only put one on. But reached out to them and they’re answer quickly and are very nice!
customer_reviews.author: lecole

product_meta.title: Motorcycle Bluetooth Intercom, Fodsports M1S Pro 2000m 8 Riders Group Motorbike Helmet Communication System Headset Universal Wireless Interphone (Waterproof/Handsfree/Stereo Music/GPS/2 Pack)
feature_bullets: 【2000M Maximum Distance】M1S Pro is equipped with Bluetooth 4.1 version, It has high compatibility and stability. If there are no obstacles such as buildings in a straight line, the motorcycle helmet intercom maximum communication distance of the group is about 2000 meters, the maximum effective communication distance between two motorcycles is about 500 meters, both can speak with clear sound quality.

【Support 8 Riders Group Intercom】Full duplex call for group motorcycle headsets system, Support for multiple people simultaneous call. With M1-S headsets, you can ensure hands-free security and convenience, listen to music, retrieve GPS routes, and receive voice commands wirelessly via Bluetooth, let you enjoy racing fun.

【Crystal-Clear Sound Quality & Handsfree】This helmet headset intercom uses high sound quality full-range membrane monomer. The M1-S Pro has high definition sound quality, especially for the bass has a high reproducibility. M1-S Pro has handsfree function, the factory setting defaults to manual answering, Switch manual/automatic answering calls: While in standby, press and hold the intercom button and volume “+ ”“- ”button at the same time for 3 seconds, you can set it to your liking.

【Noise Reduction & Waterproof】Since the microphone of motorcycle bluetooth headset has a CSR chip, ambient noise such as wind noise and engine noise are not annoying. The voice quality is not affected even at high speeds. Moreover, it is waterproof and dustproof, can be used in any weather conditions.

【Long Standby Battery & Two Options For Microphone】The motorcycle helmet communication with 900mAh rechargeable battery, Standby Up to One Week, working time up to 20 hours. M1-S Pro bluetooth motorcycle headset has hard mic and soft mic, Suitable for all kinds of helmets. You can choose the hard mic for open face helmet, and soft mic for full face helmet.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars543 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
